page.title: 01FAMILIES
page.content: I live in a detached house with my parents and my brother. My mother's name is Jacqueline, my father's name is Richard, my brother's name is Paul and my name is Lisa. My house is quite large and modern, our gardens are also quite large. There are thirteen rooms in our house, and they are also quite large. We have a living room in the front of the house and a lounge at the rear. There is a shower room and two bathrooms, a dining room, a spacious kitchen a utility room,a study, a snooker room and there are five bedrooms. Above the utility room there is a balcony. We have two lawns, one at the front and one at the rear. Also at the rear we have a patio connected to the lounge by patio doors. There is a vegetable patch
